name: Pixel Art Character Creator
description:
A pixel art fantasy character creator,  with the option to save character portraits and circular tokens for use with virtual tabletop (VTT) applications or for your own games.

So far only human and human-like character art is available.  Four different body types, with custom assets available for each.

Character artwork is released under Creative Commons Attribution-Sharealike License.  Your characters are yours for any personal and commercial use, with attribution, so long as you agree to continue to share the results with others under the same license.
